price: Allah, não existe deus senão Ele. E que os crentes, então, confiem em Allah.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۚ وَعَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَلۡيَتَوَكَّلِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: al-lahu lā ilāha illā huwa waʿalā al-lahi falyatawakkali al-mu'minūna
